author: Simon Difford
description: A well-balanced (neither too strong nor too sweet), short, fruity drink which is reminiscent of the modern-day Bramble.
name: Fog Cutter (Bramble style)
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice
DRIZZLE cherry brandy over drink and serve with straws
